Paragraph: PROCEDURES : Cats were treated with levetiracetam ( 20 mg / kg [ 9 . 1 mg / lb ] , PO , q 8 h ) .

The chemical entities in the paragraph are:

1. Levetiracetam
2. 20 mg/kg
3. 9.1 mg/lb
4. PO (which stands for "per os," meaning "by mouth")
5. q 8 h (which stands for "every 8 hours")
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Chemical.
